subject: Fwd: Simsonn Pedals and your recommendation
description_text:
Hi, can you contact this person ASAP

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: BadDadGames <funkyemt @gmail.com>
Date: Sat, 17 Jan 2026, 08:16
Subject: Simsonn Pedals and your recommendation
To: <randomcallsign.mail @gmail.com>


       Hi Random,

        I know you get tons of emails probably, but I bought simson Pedals
on your advice, I have now dealt with a single part breaking under the
throttle, the pre-tension spring. I have asked for a part from Simsonn per
their support. They told me it would ship soon on Dec 19th...it is now Jan
17th and they told me today they will ship it out :"when the holiday ends"
aka after Chinese New year...which runs from Feb 15-27th. Essentially, I
wanted you to know what's going on with a part you endorsed. I feel like
it's important you know about this and maybe contact simson and ask them
what the heck is going on. If you like, i have emails, subreddit posts
about Simsonn lying to it's customers about delivery times, part
availability, stock on hand, etc. This is unacceptable and I want you to
know since you were the one that I bought htem off your recommendation.
They are actively screwing customers, go over to /r/simsonnracing on reddit
I have tons of evidence of their lies to multiple customers, my own
interaction with simsonn support where they told me they'd ship my part on
the 23rd, the 29th, the 4th, and now Jan 17th they tell me it still hasn't
shipped and likely won't due to "holidays", which means I will have been
without pedals since Dec 19th, until after the chinese new year, which ends
Feb 27th....this isn't a company you want to endorse I don't think. I'm
down $350+$150 for the reactors(one of which never worked) and have been
without pedals for 28 days now and I have no recourse.

Ian

conversations.body_text: Hi Random CallSign, We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Due to an overwhelming volume of orders recently, our email system experienced a backlog. Our staff has already responded to him.
